chapter.1.quest.1.description.1:
&lWelcome to World of Engineers!&r


World of Engineers is a modpack that aims to refresh the Vanilla experience while bringing cool features and mechanics.


The quest book is completely optional. You can play the modpack without it, but I recommend it.
chapter.1.quest.1.subtitle: Every pack starts with this quest, right?
chapter.1.quest.1.task.1.title: Obtain any type of Log
chapter.1.quest.1.title: Obtain 10 of any type of log.
chapter.1.quest.2.description.1: Zinc and copper tools are equivalent to iron level.
chapter.1.quest.2.subtitle: You can make tools with Create ores.
chapter.1.quest.2.task.1.title: Craft any zinc or copper tool
chapter.1.quest.2.title: New early game tools!
chapter.1.quest.3.description.1:
You can make a Tetra workbench by right-clicking on a crafting table with a hammer.


Look at the Tools and Tetra chapter for more details.
chapter.1.quest.3.subtitle: You can modify your tools with the Tetra mod!
chapter.1.quest.3.title: Better Vanilla tools!
chapter.1.quest.4.description.1:
You can craft upgraded chests directly or upgrade a regular chest.


To upgrade a chest, hold the upgrade item in your hand and right-click on the chest.


For more information, look at the Storage chapter.
chapter.1.quest.4.subtitle: Craft an Iron Chest/Upgrade
chapter.1.quest.4.task.1.title: Craft an iron chest/upgrade
chapter.1.quest.4.title: More capacity - Fewer blocks!
chapter.1.quest.5.description.1: To use a chisel, right-click on it and put your block in the empty slot.
chapter.1.quest.5.subtitle: You can craft a chisel for more block variants!
chapter.1.quest.5.title: Who doesn't love more blocks?
chapter.1.quest.6.description.1: Look at the Misc tab for more useful things like that.
chapter.1.quest.6.subtitle: The saw is a stonecutter but for wood.
chapter.1.quest.6.title: This is more convenient!
chapter.1.quest.7.description.1:
To open your backpack, right-click while holding it in your hand or simply press B.


You can also upgrade your backpack slots and craft upgrades for functions like crafting and smelting.


Look at the Storage chapter for more details.
chapter.1.quest.7.subtitle: Backpacks!
chapter.1.quest.7.title: Every Adventurer's Dream
chapter.1.quest.8.task.1.title: WOE is made by ElroNdForWin for you! <3
chapter.1.quest.8.title: WOE is made by ElroNdForWin with love for you! <3
chapter.1.quest.9.subtitle: Elytra is disabled in this modpack. You can look at other transportation options in the Transportation chapter.
chapter.1.quest.9.task.1.title: About Elytra
chapter.1.title: Get Started
chapter.10.quest.1.subtitle: After placing the train station, right-click on it, then select 'Create New Train' and right-click on the blue spot on the track with a train casing to create a bogey.
chapter.10.quest.13.subtitle: The Create mod adds cool trains. You can build your own train! Check the checkmark and get started.
chapter.10.quest.13.task.1.title: Create Trains
chapter.10.quest.14.subtitle: These are the basics of Create Trains. Now, it's time to learn how to improve your trains.
chapter.10.quest.14.task.1.title: Basics Completed!
chapter.10.quest.15.subtitle: Basically seats. They are very comfortable.
chapter.10.quest.15.task.1.title: Any Seat
chapter.10.quest.15.title: Your Comfortable Friend
chapter.10.quest.16.subtitle: A train door and a train trapdoor. That's all.
chapter.10.quest.16.title: Good for trains.
chapter.10.quest.2.subtitle:
Ponder to learn how to use them.

There are many train track variants, but this is the most basic and simple one.
chapter.10.quest.4.subtitle: Ponder to learn how to use them.
chapter.10.quest.7.subtitle:
Ponder to learn how to use them.

First step of building trains.
chapter.10.title: Create Trains
chapter.11.quest.1.subtitle: It simply extends your grip.
chapter.11.quest.1.title: Extendo Grip
chapter.11.quest.15.subtitle: The Create mod brings cool diving wearables to the game. Hover over the item and hold shift for more information.
chapter.11.quest.15.task.1.title: Diving to the deep!
chapter.11.quest.16.subtitle: Extract experiences from items and yourself! You can store extracted experiences as a liquid.
chapter.11.quest.17.subtitle: You can copy your enchantment books with them.
chapter.11.quest.18.subtitle: Blazes are hardworking.
chapter.11.quest.19.subtitle: A drill but portable. Works with fuel and water.
chapter.11.quest.2.subtitle: Writes saved schematics onto an Empty Schematic.
chapter.11.quest.20.subtitle: It allows you to move and launch blocks, but with the Gravity Gun enchantment, it can move and launch entities too! It works with water.
chapter.11.quest.21.subtitle: Yes, a Flamethrower that works with fuel.
chapter.11.quest.3.subtitle: It is used to save blueprints of a structure.
chapter.11.quest.4.subtitle: The Schematicannon is a machine used to build structures from Schematics, deploying them block-by-block.
chapter.11.quest.5.subtitle: Throws potatoes. That's all.
chapter.11.quest.6.subtitle: For symmetry enthusiasts, by symmetry enthusiasts.
chapter.11.quest.7.subtitle:
You are more powerful with them!

To fuel them, put them in your off-hand and drop your fuel by pressing Q.
chapter.11.quest.7.task.1.title: Any Exoskeleton
chapter.11.quest.7.title: Exoskeletons
chapter.11.quest.8.description.1: You can craft them by putting zinc into the stonecutter. When you place the copycat and right-click on a solid block, it will turn into the block you clicked. This allows you to make grass slabs and many other creative things.
chapter.11.quest.8.subtitle: Copycats are simply framed blocks but cooler.
chapter.11.quest.8.task.1.title: Craft any Copycat
chapter.11.quest.8.title: Copycats!
chapter.11.title: Create Others
chapter.12.quest.1.subtitle: Yes, jetpacks. Cooler than elytras.
chapter.12.quest.1.task.1.title: Craft any Jetpack
chapter.12.quest.1.title: Jetpacks!
chapter.12.quest.14.subtitle:
AstikorCarts is a cart mod for horses (and you, really).

&lImportant Keybinds&r
R: Assign it to you.
R when you are on a horse: Assign it to the horse.
Shift+Right Click: Open the inventory of the cart.
chapter.12.quest.14.task.1.title: AstikorCarts
chapter.12.quest.14.title: AstikorCarts!
chapter.12.quest.18.subtitle:
Eureka! is a really cool mod that lets you make your own ship (even flying ones!).

&lImportant Keybinds&r
Shift+Right Click to Ship Helm: Open the ship menu.
Space: Ascend
Ctrl: Descend
Shift: Dismount
chapter.12.quest.18.task.1.title: Eureka!
chapter.12.quest.18.title: Eureka!
chapter.12.quest.19.subtitle: I believe I can fly!
chapter.12.quest.19.task.1.title: Any Balloon
chapter.12.quest.19.title: Balloons
chapter.12.quest.2.subtitle:
The Small Ships mod brings lots of ships, and some of them can equip cannons!

&lImportant Keybinds&r
R: Toggle Sail
Shift+Right Click: Open the Ship Menu
chapter.12.quest.2.task.1.title: Ships!
chapter.12.quest.20.subtitle: Control your ship with a ship helm. Shift + Right Click to open the ship menu.
chapter.12.quest.20.task.1.title: Any Ship Helm
chapter.12.quest.20.title: Ship Helm
chapter.12.quest.21.subtitle: Olive oil style.
chapter.12.quest.22.subtitle: For balance.
chapter.12.quest.23.subtitle: I am speed.
chapter.12.quest.24.subtitle: You can craft large boats that can carry 3 entities.
chapter.12.quest.24.task.1.title: Any Large Boat
chapter.12.quest.24.title: Large Boats!
chapter.12.quest.25.subtitle: Like Fortnite (or maybe Zelda?) gliders. Equip it and when you are in the air, press space.
chapter.12.quest.25.task.1.title: Any Glider
chapter.12.quest.25.title: Gliders!
chapter.12.quest.3.subtitle: It can carry 11 entities and 10 shields. (Right-Click to assign shields)
chapter.12.quest.3.task.1.title: Any Drakkar
chapter.12.quest.3.title: Drakkars
chapter.12.quest.4.subtitle: It can carry 9 entities and 2 cannons.
chapter.12.quest.4.task.1.title: Any Galley
chapter.12.quest.4.title: Galleys
chapter.12.quest.5.subtitle: It can carry 11 entities and 6 cannons.
chapter.12.quest.5.task.1.title: Any Brigg
chapter.12.quest.5.title: Briggs
chapter.12.quest.6.subtitle: It can carry 5 entities and 4 cannons.
chapter.12.quest.6.task.1.title: Any Cog
chapter.12.quest.6.title: Cogs
chapter.12.quest.7.subtitle:
Immersive Aircraft is an immersive aircraft mod. (yes.) You can make some cool flying stuff with this mod. They work with coal.

&lImportant Keybinds&r
R: Dismount
Space: Ascend
Shift: Descend

You can also upgrade and equip your aircraft with weapons. Search for 'aircraft upgrade' or 'aircraft weapon' in your EMI menu.
chapter.12.quest.7.task.1.title: Immersive Aircraft
chapter.12.quest.7.title: Immersive Aircraft!
chapter.12.title: Transportation
chapter.13.quest.1.subtitle: It's time to be Gordon Ramsay!
chapter.13.quest.10.task.1.title: Any Jam
chapter.13.quest.10.title: Jams
chapter.13.quest.11.subtitle: To obtain hoglin hide, kill a hoglin with a knife.
chapter.13.quest.11.title: Is that murder?
chapter.13.quest.12.title: Delicious.
chapter.13.quest.13.task.1.title: Any Salad
chapter.13.quest.13.title: Salads
chapter.13.quest.14.task.1.title: Any Sandwich
chapter.13.quest.14.title: Sandwiches
chapter.13.quest.15.task.1.title: Any Pie
chapter.13.quest.15.title: Pies
chapter.13.quest.16.subtitle: Farmer's Delight and its addons add lots of different crops to the game.
chapter.13.quest.16.title: New Crops!
chapter.13.quest.17.task.1.title: Any Beverage
chapter.13.quest.17.title: Beverages
chapter.13.quest.18.subtitle: Cut out for miners.
chapter.13.quest.19.task.1.title: Any Sweet
chapter.13.quest.19.title: Sweets
chapter.13.quest.2.subtitle: Bro is cooked!
chapter.13.quest.3.subtitle: 4x faster campfire but it can only cook 1 item at a time.
chapter.13.quest.4.subtitle: Another basic item of Farmer's Delight recipes.
chapter.13.quest.4.task.1.title: Any Knife
chapter.13.quest.4.title: Cutting like a chef!
chapter.13.quest.5.task.1.title: Any Burger
chapter.13.quest.5.title: Burgers
chapter.13.quest.6.task.1.title: Any Soup
chapter.13.quest.6.title: Soups
chapter.13.quest.7.task.1.title: Any Roll
chapter.13.quest.7.title: Rolls
chapter.13.quest.8.subtitle: Mix of rolls.
chapter.13.quest.9.task.1.title: Any Pasta
chapter.13.quest.9.title: Pastas
chapter.13.title: Farmer's Delight
chapter.14.quest.1.subtitle:
Handcrafted is the furniture mod of your dreams. It adds lots of furniture to the game.

For more items and blocks, type @handcrafted into the EMI search bar.
chapter.14.quest.1.task.1.title: Handcrafted
chapter.14.quest.1.title: Handcrafted
chapter.14.quest.10.subtitle: Vertical slabs, every builder's dream.
chapter.14.quest.10.task.1.title: Any Vertical Slab
chapter.14.quest.11.subtitle: Use this on a block, and it will count the distance between the block you're looking at and the one you clicked, up to 48 blocks.
chapter.14.quest.12.subtitle: Animals can eat any items put in this and breed from it.
chapter.14.quest.13.subtitle: Amendments is a mod focused on tweaks to many existing vanilla blocks, such as carpeted stairs, wall lanterns, and tripwire hooks that can hold items (shift-click). Explore it!
chapter.14.quest.13.task.1.title: Amendments
chapter.14.quest.2.title: Tables
chapter.14.quest.3.title: Chairs
chapter.14.quest.4.subtitle: Handcrafted hammer changes the look of some handcrafted blocks, like corner and pillar trims.
chapter.14.quest.4.title: Handcrafted Hammer
chapter.14.quest.5.subtitle:
Supplementaries adds many interactable and useful blocks and items.

Type @supplementaries into the EMI search bar to see all of them.
chapter.14.quest.5.task.1.title: Supplementaries
chapter.14.quest.6.subtitle: Wrench is used to rotate some placed blocks, like slabs, vertical slabs, and stairs.
chapter.14.quest.7.subtitle:
Flaxes can be used in many crafting recipes.

They are very useful for string farming because you can turn them into strings.
chapter.14.quest.8.subtitle: Some items, like books and sticks, can be placed thanks to Supplementaries.
chapter.14.quest.8.task.1.title: Placeable Items
chapter.14.quest.9.subtitle:
Quark is a huge mod that adds small features.

Type @quark into the EMI search bar to see all.
chapter.14.quest.9.task.1.title: Quark
chapter.14.title: Miscellaneous
chapter.2.quest.1.subtitle: Craft a Terminal and access your large storage in one GUI!
chapter.2.quest.1.task.1.title: Craft a Terminal
chapter.2.quest.1.title: First Steps!
chapter.2.quest.10.subtitle: Control your storage system remotely from a maximum distance of 16 blocks. Craft a Wireless Terminal.
chapter.2.quest.11.description.1:
You can also upgrade your system with a beacon to access your storage from anywhere.

Level 1 beacon = access everywhere in the same dimension.

Level 4 beacon = access in all dimensions.
chapter.2.quest.11.subtitle: Control your storage system remotely from a maximum distance of 64 blocks. Upgrade to Advanced Wireless Terminal.
chapter.2.quest.12.subtitle: You can access Create's Vault inventory through the storage system. It’s very convenient, but don't tell anyone about it :)
chapter.2.quest.13.subtitle: Craft a Copper Chest or upgrade.
chapter.2.quest.13.task.1.title: Copper Chest
chapter.2.quest.14.subtitle: Craft an Iron Chest or upgrade.
chapter.2.quest.14.task.1.title: Iron Chest
chapter.2.quest.15.subtitle: Craft a Gold Chest or upgrade.
chapter.2.quest.15.title: Gold Chest
chapter.2.quest.16.subtitle: Craft a Diamond Chest or upgrade.
chapter.2.quest.16.title: Diamond Chest
chapter.2.quest.17.subtitle: Craft a Backpack.
chapter.2.quest.18.subtitle: Upgrade your Backpack to Copper.
chapter.2.quest.19.subtitle: Upgrade your Backpack to Iron.
chapter.2.quest.2.subtitle: Connect all your storage in one block!
chapter.2.quest.2.title: Advanced Vanilla Storage System!
chapter.2.quest.20.subtitle: Upgrade your Backpack to Gold.
chapter.2.quest.21.subtitle: Upgrade your Backpack to Diamond.
chapter.2.quest.22.subtitle: Upgrade your Backpack to Netherite.
chapter.2.quest.23.subtitle:
You can upgrade your backpack with various upgrades. This item is the base for all of them.

Type 'backpack upgrade' into the EMI search bar for all upgrades.
chapter.2.quest.3.subtitle: They're good for long distances. Craft one Inventory Cable and one Inventory Cable Connector.
chapter.2.quest.3.title: Cables! But for Items, Yeah.
chapter.2.quest.4.subtitle: Craft a Framed Cable and a Framed Inventory Cable Connector.
chapter.2.quest.4.title: Framed Cables
chapter.2.quest.5.subtitle: Craft a Filtered Cable Connector.
chapter.2.quest.5.title: Filtered Cables
chapter.2.title: Storage
chapter.3.quest.1.description.1: Craft a hammer, hold the Hammer, and right-click on a regular crafting table to transform it into a Workbench. This grants access to the Tetra menu for modular crafting. To revert it to a crafting table, simply break it.
chapter.3.quest.1.subtitle: To start exploring Tetra, make your first Workbench.
chapter.3.quest.1.task.1.title: Workbench
chapter.3.quest.1.task.2.title: Hammer
chapter.3.quest.1.title: Creating a Workbench
chapter.3.quest.10.subtitle: Thermal Cells can be charged by Core Extractors that can be found in Ancient Ruins.
chapter.3.quest.10.title: Charge a Thermal Cell
chapter.3.quest.11.description.1: Activate a Forge Hammer by inserting two Thermal Cells into each smaller square slot and equipping any forge attachment into the other slots. Once activated, orange lights will illuminate, and you'll unlock the 'Restored Machinery' advancement.
chapter.3.quest.11.subtitle: Activate them with two Thermal Cells and two Forge Attachments.
chapter.3.quest.11.title: Repair a Forge Hammer
chapter.3.quest.12.subtitle: Find a Chthonic Extractor in Ancient Ruins, place it on bedrock, and hit it with a hammer.
chapter.3.quest.12.title: Manual Extraction
chapter.3.quest.13.subtitle: Automate the extraction by placing a Forge Hammer above the Extractor while powering it with redstone.
chapter.3.quest.13.title: Automatic Extraction
chapter.3.quest.2.description.1:
Crafting your first Hammer adds a Holosphere to your inventory, a grey sphere serving as an in-game lexicon for materials, tool types, and modules. It showcases compatibility with other mods. Exploring the Holosphere is recommended for new players to grasp the mod's possibilities.

You can upgrade it with an Eye of Ender. With an upgraded Holosphere, you can find ruins that help when upgrading the Obsidian Hammer.
chapter.3.quest.2.subtitle: Beginner's best friend! Obtain a Holosphere.
chapter.3.quest.3.description.1: You need 2 Stone Hammers for this. One in the inventory and one in the Workbench.
chapter.3.quest.3.subtitle: Upgrade to Iron Hammer.
chapter.3.quest.4.description.1: You need 2 Iron Hammers for this. One in the inventory and one in the Workbench.
chapter.3.quest.4.subtitle: Upgrade to Blackstone Hammer.
chapter.3.quest.5.subtitle: Upgrade to Obsidian Hammer with Forge Hammer.
chapter.3.quest.6.subtitle: Upgrade to a Netherite Hammer with a Forge Hammer and one Combustion Chamber.
chapter.3.quest.7.subtitle: Craft or upgrade to Stone Hammer.
chapter.3.quest.8.subtitle: Upgrade your Holosphere to make finding it easier.
chapter.3.quest.8.title: Find and Explore Ancient Ruins
chapter.3.quest.9.title: Obtain a Thermal Cell
chapter.3.title: Tools and Tetra
chapter.4.quest.1.subtitle: You all know how to build the portal.
chapter.4.quest.1.title: Enter the Aether
chapter.4.quest.2.task.1.title: More will be added in future updates.
chapter.4.title: The Aether
chapter.5.quest.1.task.1.title: More will be added in future updates.
chapter.5.quest.2.description.1:
To make a Twilight Forest portal, you need to:
- Break a 2x2 area and fill it with water,
- Place flowers around the water,
- Drop a Diamond into the water.
And it will turn into a Twilight Forest portal.
chapter.5.quest.2.subtitle: Check the description for how to build the portal.
chapter.5.quest.2.title: Enter the Twilight Forest
chapter.5.title: The Twilight Forest
chapter.6.quest.1.subtitle:
The portal can be found near the Gatekeeper's house.

You can light it with the Zeal Lighter, which can be obtained through trading with the Gatekeeper.
chapter.6.quest.1.task.1.title: Enter the Everbright
chapter.6.quest.1.title: Enter the Everbright
chapter.6.quest.2.task.1.title: More will be added in future updates.
chapter.6.title: Everbright
chapter.7.quest.1.subtitle:
The portal can be found near the Gatekeeper's house.

You can light it with the Zeal Lighter, which can be obtained through trading with the Gatekeeper.
chapter.7.quest.1.title: Enter the Everdawn
chapter.7.quest.2.task.1.title: More will be added in future updates.
chapter.7.title: Everdawn
chapter.8.quest.1.subtitle: Create mod lets you create contraptions and automate tasks using Rotational Power. It includes numerous mechanical parts and different block types for the game. Click the checkmark and start!
chapter.8.quest.1.task.1.title: Welcome to Create!
chapter.8.quest.10.subtitle:
The Mechanical Press can process some items. Look at the Ponder for more info.

It is used to make sheets in the beginning.
chapter.8.quest.10.title: Press, Press, and Press!
chapter.8.quest.11.subtitle: Make an Andesite Casing. Right-click a stripped wood or log with an Andesite Alloy.
chapter.8.quest.12.subtitle: You can put a depot under the press machine for easier access. They are not just used for the Mechanical Press; you can use them with other machines. Look at the Ponder for more info.
chapter.8.quest.13.subtitle:
You can generate rotational power with your hand, but it is too tiring.

It can be useful while using the Mechanical Saw.
chapter.8.quest.14.subtitle: Craft an Engineer's Goggles. Engineer's Goggles are a wearable item that allow the user to see more details about placed machines.
chapter.8.quest.14.title: Engineer's Best Friend!
chapter.8.quest.15.subtitle: A mechanical machine that can push and pull entities. When used with water, lava, or campfire, it can blast, wash, haunt, and smoke items.
chapter.8.quest.16.subtitle: When placed in front of an Encased Fan, it can wash items.
chapter.8.quest.16.title: Washing
chapter.8.quest.17.subtitle: When placed in front of an Encased Fan, it can blast items.
chapter.8.quest.17.title: Blasting
chapter.8.quest.18.subtitle: When placed in front of an Encased Fan, it can smoke items.
chapter.8.quest.18.title: Smoking
chapter.8.quest.19.subtitle: When placed in front of an Encased Fan, it can haunt items.
chapter.8.quest.19.title: Haunting
chapter.8.quest.2.subtitle: Create's base material is Andesite Alloy. Craft some Andesite Alloys.
chapter.8.quest.2.title: Andesite Alloys
chapter.8.quest.20.subtitle: Craft a wrench.
chapter.8.quest.20.title: Engineer's Other Best Friend!
chapter.8.quest.21.subtitle: You can process some basic items with the Millstone.
chapter.8.quest.21.title: Basic Grinding
chapter.8.quest.22.subtitle: A mechanical machine that can fell trees.
chapter.8.quest.23.subtitle: You can automate some shapeless crafting recipes and some special ones with the Mechanical Mixer. Some recipes need a Blaze Burner.
chapter.8.quest.24.subtitle: Put it under the Mechanical Mixer.
chapter.8.quest.25.subtitle:
Our next step is making a Brass Ingot.

We need a Blaze Burner for this.

Right-click a Blaze or Blaze Spawner with an Empty Blaze Burner.
chapter.8.quest.25.title: Blaze Burner
chapter.8.quest.26.subtitle: To make a Brass Ingot, place the Blaze Burner under the Basin, heat it with coal or any fuel, and then mix Zinc and Copper.
chapter.8.quest.27.subtitle: Make a Brass Casing. Right-click a wood or log with a Brass Ingot.
chapter.8.quest.28.subtitle:
You can automate all Crafting Table crafts with them. Also, you can make it bigger than 9x9 to craft some special things.

Craft 21 Mechanical Crafters.
You'll craft Crushing Wheels with them.
chapter.8.quest.28.title: Mechanical Crafters
chapter.8.quest.29.subtitle: Craft an Electron Tube.
chapter.8.quest.3.subtitle: In Create, the shaft is a simple mechanical part. It links two other parts, so when one rotates, it makes the other rotate too. It's also where you can put Mechanical Belts, the only place they can go.
chapter.8.quest.3.title: Shafts
chapter.8.quest.30.subtitle: Craft a Rose Quartz and Sandpaper. Put your Sandpaper in your left hand, take Rose Quartz in your right hand, and hold right-click. It will give you Polished Rose Quartz.
chapter.8.quest.31.subtitle: You can double your ores with Crushing Wheels. Look at the Ponder for more info.
chapter.8.quest.31.title: Ore Processing!
chapter.8.quest.32.subtitle: Make some sheets.
chapter.8.quest.32.task.1.title: Any Sheet
chapter.8.quest.32.title: Ah Sheet, Here We Go Again.
chapter.8.quest.33.subtitle: Deployers can imitate player interactions. Look at the Ponder for more info.
chapter.8.quest.33.title: Deployers
chapter.8.quest.34.title: Speedometer and Stressometer
chapter.8.quest.35.subtitle: Gearboxes for all sides.
chapter.8.quest.35.title: 6-way Gearboxes
chapter.8.quest.4.description.1: Also, you can access the Ponder index through the ESC menu > Engineer's Goggles Icon > Ponder Index.
chapter.8.quest.4.subtitle:
You can Ponder a Create block/item by hovering over it in the inventory or EMI and holding the W button until the bar under the item fills up. This shows an animated infographic about the item you're pondering.

Pondering is greater than even a wiki or reading something. If you want to learn something, just ponder.
chapter.8.quest.4.task.1.title: Pondering
chapter.8.quest.5.subtitle: Craft some Cogwheels. Cogwheels can be used to increase rotational speed or extend contraptions. Look at the Ponder for more information.
chapter.8.quest.5.title: Cogwheels
chapter.8.quest.6.subtitle: You can generate kinetic energy with water. Look at the Ponder for more information.
chapter.8.quest.6.title: Generating Rotational Force with Water
chapter.8.quest.7.subtitle: You can generate kinetic energy with wind. Look at the Ponder for more information. Also, you can use regular wool as windmill sails, but you must glue them with Super Glue.
chapter.8.quest.7.title: Generating Rotational Force with Wind
chapter.8.quest.8.subtitle: You can rotate your rotational power with gearboxes, either horizontal or vertical.
chapter.8.quest.8.title: Gearboxes
chapter.8.quest.9.subtitle: Regular gearboxes change the direction of rotational power, but parallel gearboxes do not.
chapter.8.quest.9.title: Parallel Gearboxes
chapter.8.title: Basics of Create
chapter.9.quest.1.subtitle: You can manipulate fluids with the Create mod. Look at the Ponder for how to use them.
chapter.9.quest.1.title: Create Fluid Manipulators
chapter.9.quest.10.subtitle: When used with contraptions, this block creates farmlands.
chapter.9.quest.11.subtitle: When used with contraptions, it can break blocks.
chapter.9.quest.12.subtitle: Even large drill machines can be made with them.
chapter.9.quest.13.subtitle: LOOOOOOOOOOOOONGER PISTONS!
chapter.9.quest.14.subtitle: Moving things. One of the basic things in Create.
chapter.9.quest.15.subtitle: Simple, basic elevators.
chapter.9.quest.16.subtitle: Slide.
chapter.9.quest.17.subtitle: Contraptions can be controlled with them.\n\nUseful for elevators.
chapter.9.quest.18.subtitle: Attaching blocks are easier with them.
chapter.9.quest.19.subtitle: YOU, CAN, MAKE, REAL, CLOCKS!
chapter.9.quest.20.subtitle: Something can be lifted up and down with them.
chapter.9.quest.21.subtitle: Like sticky pistons, but not for push or pull things.
chapter.9.quest.22.subtitle: This section is about Create's Item Transportation.\n\nIt's recommended that use Ponders to understand each of them.

chapter.9.quest.40.description.1: PS: You don't need to mess with mechanical arms or something like that while automating the Steam Engine. In this modpack, there is a mod called 'Create: Liquid Fuels' so you can pump lava directly to the blaze burner.
